profile_evaluation.profile_strength_notes: Your experience and skill levels align well with SDE roles in top companies, but enhancing system design skills could open more senior opportunities.

experience_benchmark.gap_analysis: You meet the typical experience requirement for FAANG SDE roles.

interview_readiness.technical_notes: Solid technical foundation, yet improving system design proficiency and interview exposure will heighten readiness.

peer_comparison.label: Above Average
peer_comparison.summary: You excel above most peers but can further refine certain skills to stand out in FAANG applications.

success_likelihood.label: Strong likelihood of success
success_likelihood.notes: With focused improvements in system design and interview skills, success in securing a FAANG role is promising.

quick_wins.title: Expand System Design Expertise
quick_wins.description: Design a complex distributed system map to solidify understanding. Focus on scalability and fault tolerance strategies. 2-3 weeks.

quick_wins.title: Double Mock Interview Frequency
quick_wins.description: Move from monthly to bi-weekly mocks, focusing on coding and system design for FAANG-style rounds. 4 weeks.

quick_wins.title: Contribute to Open-source
quick_wins.description: Submit 3 meaningful PRs in relevant projects (Node.js/Python/Java) to show off collaboration skills. 3-4 weeks.

opportunities_you_qualify_for: SDE-2 at Amazon India - Experience in product-based ecosystems
Backend Engineer at Flipkart - Skills in scalable systems
Software Engineer at CRED - Strong problem-solving background

recommended_roles_based_on_interests.title: SDE-2 at Google
recommended_roles_based_on_interests.reason: Your current role at Google and demonstrated proficiency makes this a natural next step.

recommended_roles_based_on_interests.title: Software Engineer II at Amazon
recommended_roles_based_on_interests.reason: Experience with product-based companies aligns well with this role.

recommended_roles_based_on_interests.reason: Focus on backend systems and scalable architecture is ideal for this position.
